elements.Text: Since you have been out of touch, your friend is probably thinking

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
buttons: "I guess this friendship isn't worth very much."
"I'm sure things are just really busy right now."
